channel.title: Productivity on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Productivity on My New Hugo Site

item.title: So Good They Can't Ignore You - Cal Newport
item.description: A series of blog posts that unfortunately became a book. Not recommended.

item.title: Four Thousand Weeks: Time Management for Mortals by Oliver Burkeman
item.description: A book about time and our relationship with it. Recommended.
